Package query

Interface Summary
Plan Common interface for all minibase query execution plans.
 

Class Summary
Catalog Minibase System Catalog
CreateIndex Execution plan for creating indexes.
CreateTable Execution plan for creating tables.
Delete Execution plan for deleting tuples.
Describe Execution plan for describing tables.
DropIndex Execution plan for dropping indexes.
DropTable Execution plan for dropping tables.
IndexDesc Index descriptor, i.e.
Insert Execution plan for inserting tuples.
Optimizer Minibase Query Optimizer
QueryCheck Uses the catalogs to perform final type checking for query statements.
Select Execution plan for selecting tuples.
Update Execution plan for updating tuples.
 

Exception Summary
QueryException General exception for query execution issues.
